question: "Hasan Nizami" and “Fakh-e-Mudabbir" were the court poets of which ruler of Mamluk Sultanate?
explanation: "Hasan Nizami" and “Fakh-e-Mudabbir" were the court poets of Qutb-ud-din Aybak. Hasan Nizami was a Persian language poet and historian. akhr- I Mudabbir was a Persian author and courtier under successive Ghaznavid, Ghūrid, and Shamsī sultans in South Asia.
